title: 96/628/EC: Commission Decision of 18 October 1996 amending Decision 96/483/EC drawing up the list of third countries entitled to use the model animal health certificates for imports into the Community of live poultry and hatching eggs other than ratites and eggs thereof as laid down by Decision 96/482/EC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 October 1996 amending Decision 96/483/EC drawing up the list of third countries entitled to use the model animal health certificates for imports into the Community of live poultry and hatching eggs other than ratites and eggs thereof as laid down by Decision 96/482/EC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/628/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 96/483/EC is replaced by the Annex to the present Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 1 October 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 196, 7. 8. 1996, p. 28.
(3) OJ No L 196, 7. 8. 1996, p. 13.
ANNEX
'ANNEX
Those third countries which are authorized to use the model certificates A to D set up in Annex I of Decision 96/482/EC are marked with an ×.
>TABLE>
